taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Particularly abundant in coastal creeks and floodplains where it is supported by a certain salinity level.  It is vulnerable to a trematode parasite which induces a characteristic cutaneous reaction.  Reproduction in captivity has been successful (Ref. 12225).  Maximum length questionable (Ref. 38376).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  Rivers of Guyana, Suriname, French Guiana, and Amazon River basin.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Rivers of Guyana, Suriname, French Guiana and Amazon River basin: Brazil. French Guiana, Guyana, Peru and Suriname.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.description: 5.3 cm TL (male/unsexed; (Ref. 38376)); max. reported age: 4 years (Ref. 12225)
